name: FrostBite (itch) (Sugghy)
description:
Music was created by : levelplane

Use the arrow keys to move your character

Use x to use item or interact with objects;

Use z to drop item, this can be done only at the fireplace

FrostBite is a small minit like game created for MiniJam 75 where the theme was Wisdom and the limitation Weight. Your mission is to find the Wisdom Tree and to avoid dying in the cold.You can only survive 15 sec outside, find a fireplace to warm up. Your character is weak that is way he can carry only one item at a time.
